awd_titl_txt: International Union of Pure and Applied Physics Triennial   Conference on Thermodynamics and Statistical Mechanics      (STATPHYS-19), Xiamen, China, July 31 - August 4, 1995
awd_abstract_narration: 9521024  Stanley  This grant provides travel funds to young investigators  participating in the Nineteenth International Union of Pure  and Applied Physics Conference on Thermodynamics and  Statistical Mechanics to be held in Xiamen, China, July 31  August 4, 1995.  This is a broad conference which affects  many scientific disciplines.  As such, the funding for these  travel grants is provided by the Divisions of Materials  Research, Mathematical Sciences and Physics.  %%%  This grant provides travel funds to young investigators  participating in the Nineteenth International Union of Pure  and Applied Physics Conference on Thermodynamics and  Statistical Mechanics to be held in Xiamen, China, July 31 -  August 4, 1995.
